document_data.name: Noohar Serelim
document_data.mainbody: '''Noohar Serelim''' was a merchant that operated on the [[Sword Coast]] as of the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Personality: Noohar was one of the most articulate persons in [[Faerun]]. He was a fantastic orator and talked non-stop, even though he seldom had something to say.
document_data.History: At some point in the 1480s [[DR]],{{ToD-time}} Noohar and his brother [[Selvek Serelim|Selvek]] were transporting some exquisite wooden carvings made by their people via a great caravan that, unknown to them, was full of [[Cult of the Dragon]] agents carrying treasures for use in a ritual involving their goddess [[Tiamat]].
